column4: But Coca Cola is a corporate whore; I think it's rather fitting in that circumtance ;)

and you'll need to steal some space from the Windows
you might need wheel, or to edit sudoers list :]
Depends how much more space you'll use up on windows as to how much you leave it with ;)
Are you going to be using Ubuntu as your _primary_ OS?
hmm touche. thats why i prefer a swapfile tho. running out of space? no worries! just rm the swapfile and dd a new one
